channel.title: Why do players get reset?
channel.description:
Haha haven't asked for help in a while, but i need help with this one.
Base: Delta (don't hate) :p
There has been many resets happening on both my servers. At first when i just had one server on it wasn't that bad, but when i started hosting the second one players on both servers started reseting alot. There accounts would be completely gone.
My guess is how to stop it is to make the system check that the packets being sent from the players get here fully not get cut of else it will not save the players account if the packets get cut off. Unfortunately idk how to write that out. anybody wana help me :)

@vovik wrote:

ill look around see if i can fix it. doubt it tho

Read full topic

item.title: Why do players get reset?
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

i have that it saves cahr files each 30 secs but the thing is each time a player disconects it saves their char file no matter how much data the server recieve it will save it so if it only recieved little bit of that data it will pretty much reset alot of what the player had get wat im saying?

Read full topic

item.title: Why do players get reset?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

add a playersave for each 10mins or 5, but make it mass saving, i have the code for PI but not delta.

Read full topic

item.title: Why do players get reset?

item.description:
@vovik wrote:

Haha haven’t asked for help in a while, but i need help with this one.

Base: Delta (don’t hate)

There has been many resets happening on both my servers. At first when i just had one server on it wasn’t that bad, but when i started hosting the second one players on both servers started reseting alot. There accounts would be completely gone.

My guess is how to stop it is to make the system check that the packets being sent from the players get here fully not get cut of else it will not save the players account if the packets get cut off. Unfortunately idk how to write that out. anybody wana help me
